resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/1452181242</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>1452181242</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770201781</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Friction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Friktion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Frottement</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fricção</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Attrito</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τριβή</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fricción</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Learn how friction causes a material to heat up and melt. Rub two objects together and they heat up. When one reaches the melting temperature, particles break free as the material melts away.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erlernen Sie, wie Friktion ein Material zur Hitze 
oben verursacht und schmelzen Sie. Löschen Sie zwei zusammen 
Nachrichten und sie erhitzen oben. Wenn man die schmelzende 
Temperatur erreicht, schmilzt Partikelbruch frei als das Material weg.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Apprenez comment le frottement cause un matériel 
à la chaleur vers le haut et fondez. Frottez deux objets 
ensemble et ils rechauffent. Quand on atteint la température de
fonte, la rupture de particules librement comme matériel fond.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Aprenda como a fricção causa um material ao 
calor acima e derreta. Friccione dois objetos junto e aquecem-se
acima. Quando um alcança a temperatura de derretimento, a 
ruptura das partículas livre como o material derrete afastado.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Impari come l'attrito causa un materiale a calore 
in su e fondasi. Lucidi insieme due oggetti e riscaldano. 
Quando uno raggiunge la temperatura di fusione, la rottura delle
particelle come il materiale si fonde liberamente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μάθετε πώς η τριβή αναγκάζει ένα υλικό για να 
θερμάνει επάνω και να λειώσει. Τρίψτε δύο αντικείμενα 
μαζί και θερμαίνουν επάνω. Όταν το ένα φθάνει στη 
θερμοκρασία τήξης, τα μόρια σπάζουν ελεύθερο ως υλικά λειωμένα 
μέταλλα μακριά.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Aprenda cómo la fricción causa un material al 
calor para arriba y derrita. Frote dos objetos juntos y 
calientan para arriba. Cuando uno alcanza la temperatura que 
derrite, la rotura de las partículas como el material derrite 
libremente lejos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770201781</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>1452181242</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/architecture-studio-intentions-spring-2005</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
